title: Reparations In New Zealand
description: A wool magnate gets pulled into a fight with the government over reparations. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.

itunes:title: Reparations In New Zealand
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: We follow Mavis Mullins, Māori sheep-shearing magnate, through New Zealand's reparations system — from the fact-finding Waitangi Tribunal to a public apology.
itunes:subtitle: We follow Mavis Mullins, Māori sheep-shearing magnate, through New Zealand's reparations system — from the fact-finding Waitangi Tribunal to a public apology.
